flavorText: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.

foreignData.flavorText: Zndrsplt trat als Richterin in den Ruhestand, als sie sich mit Okaun zusammenschloss, aber sie kennt die Strafen immer noch besser als irgendjemand sonst.
foreignData.name: Zndrsplts Richtspruch
foreignData.text: Bestimme für jeden Spieler Freund oder Feind. Jeder Freund erzeugt einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie einer Kreatur ist, die er kontrolliert. Jeder Feind bringt eine Kreatur, die er kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Aunque Zndrsplt dejó de presidir cuando formó equipo con Okaun, sigue conociendo las penalizaciones mejor que nadie.
foreignData.name: Juicio de Zndrsplt
foreignData.text: Por cada jugador, elige amigo o enemigo. Cada amigo crea una ficha que es una copia de una criatura que controla. Cada enemigo regresa una criatura que controla a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Zndrsplt a cessé de présider lorsqu'elle s'est associée à Okaun, mais elle connaît encore les sanctions mieux que quiconque.
foreignData.name: Jugement de Zndrsplt
foreignData.text: Pour chaque joueur, choisissez ami ou ennemi. Chaque ami crée un jeton qui est une copie d'une créature qu'il contrôle. Chaque ennemi renvoie une créature qu'il contrôle dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Zndrsplt smise di arbitrare quando decise di combattere assieme a Okaun; nonostante ciò, conosce ancora le penalità meglio di chiunque altro.
foreignData.name: Giudizio di Zndrsplt
foreignData.text: Per ogni giocatore, scegli se è un amico o un nemico. Ogni amico crea una pedina che è una copia di una creatura che controlla. Ogni nemico fa tornare una creatura che controlla in mano al suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: ゼンドスプルトはオカウンと出会ってチームを結成したときに審判を辞めた。だが今でも彼女は他の誰よりも罰則に詳しい。
foreignData.name: ゼンドスプルトの裁定
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人につき、あなたは、味方か敵かを選ぶ。各味方はそれぞれ、自分がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体のコピーであるトークン１体を生成する。各敵はそれぞれ、自分がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: Zndrsplt se aposentou da arbitragem quando se tornou parceira de Okaun, mas ela ainda conhece as penalidades melhor do que ninguém.
foreignData.name: Julgamento de Zndrsplt
foreignData.text: Para cada jogador, escolha amigo ou inimigo. Cada amigo cria uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma criatura que ele controla. Cada inimigo devolve uma criatura que ele controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Объединившись с Окауном, Зндрсплт ушла из судейства, но про наказания до сих пор знает больше, чем кто-либо еще.
foreignData.name: Правосудие Зндрсплт
foreignData.text: Для каждого игрока выберите, друг он или враг. Каждый друг создает одну фишку, являющуюся копией существа под его контролем. Каждый враг возвращает существо под своим контролем в руку его владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 自从与欧寇然搭档参赛后，岑斯莉就不再担任裁判一职，但她对罚则依旧有过人理解。
foreignData.name: 岑斯莉的裁决
foreignData.text: 为每位牌手分别选择友方或敌方。每位友方各派出一个为任一由其操控的生物之复制品的衍生物。每位敌方各将一个由其操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 自從與歐寇然搭檔參賽后，岑斯莉就不再擔任裁判一職，但她對罰則依舊有過人理解。
foreignData.name: 岑斯莉的裁決
foreignData.text: 為每位玩家分別選擇友方或敵方。每位友方各派出一個為任一由其操控的生物之複製品的衍生物。每位敵方各將一個由其操控的生物移回其擁有者手上。

name: Zndrsplt's Judgment
originalText: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: When Zndrsplt's Judgment resolves and you choose friend or foe, first the next friend in turn order (or, if it's a friend's turn, that friend) chooses a creature they control, then each other friend in turn order does the same, then each of those players create a token at the same time. Friends will know choices made by earlier players when making their choices. Repeat this process for foes, who choose a creature one at a time and then return them all to their owners' hands at the same time.

Each token copies exactly what is printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If the copied creature is a token, the token that's created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created the token.
If the copied creature is copying something else (for example, if the copied creature is an Evil Twin), then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
You make this choice for yourself as well as each other player. In some rare cases, you may wish to call yourself (or your teammate in a Two-Headed Giant game) a foe. You can do that.

The designation of friend or foe is only relevant to the spell that asks you to choose. A player you call your friend doesn't become your teammate, and the next “friend or foe” spell you cast could name that player your foe.
You may call a player a friend or a foe even if that player will be instructed to perform an impossible action. For example, for Regna's Sanction, a foe may control no untapped creatures.

Friends perform their specified actions before foes. This means that a friend's action may cause a triggered ability of a foe's permanent to trigger before that foe's action causes that permanent to leave the battlefield.

Players can't take actions in between the time that friends perform their actions and the time that foes perform theirs. If any abilities trigger from friends performing actions, those triggers won't be put onto the stack until the foes perform their actions and the spell finishes resolving.

text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
